channel.title: Server Crashing
channel.description:
Oki, So I Was Trying To Add A New Quest For Godswords And Stuff And I Found Out It Didnt Work And I Deleted Exactly What i Added... So I Recompiled And Then I Ran The Server Tested It And After 1Min Roughly It kept Massing My Runserver.bat Saying Index Array Out Of Bounds Exeption: 19 Or Something And I Have Not Got A Clue Why... Last Time I Had 2 Get A New Source :confused:
PLEASE POST ANY HELP YOU CAN!
It Only Seems To Happen If I Logout :confused:
Pic; [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2rords7.jpg[/img]

item.title: Server Crashing
item.dc:creator: @ashman335 ashman335
item.description:
@ashman335 wrote:

Ive Just Checked Through EveryWhere I Edited In Client.Java And Theres No Incorrect Spaces
Erm…Any Other THings?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 13, 2009, 08:51:18 am[/size][hr]If Any1 Wants To Like Check The Client.java Add Me On MSN; Lakers_rock@hotmail.co.uk
This Is Getting Anoying Now Ive Worked 9Months On This Serv
